bibl.title: Christina HELMS and Arthur M.F.W. VERHOOGT, Documents from Berenike. I: Greek Ostraka from the 1996-1998 Seasons. (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 31.)
bibl.note: O. Ber. I, 1-117. - University of Delaware and University of Leiden Excavations at Berenike on the Red Sea. - Introduction. - 1. The archaeological context. - 2. The groups of ostraka. Date of the ostraka [Ist century C.E.]. - 3. The place of the ostraka in the customs process. - 4. The officials. - 5. Goods and measures. - 6. Personal names. - Texts, translations and notes. - Indexes.
